body:
We have been trying to progress, and with our team we've had a few changes here and there. Preparation is important, so please be patient for the tournament to be announced. Anywho, our roster has been rearranged a bit and we want to clarify who is located in it;

Main Leader: DoctaPop
Committee Member / Maps: ParaSpider
Committee Member: Hughsie1
Committee Member: tel6331
Committee Member: Notalgicular
Committee Member: AviGill
Committee Member: pelpelajax

Seven (7) members in total. Thanks for reading, and stay classy Avicus.

title: Clarification on Event Committee Roster

replies.body:
could you do tournament versions of maps?
like a tournament version of quintus without diamond armour etc just making it more tournament friendly.
also with the YMLs could you make it so there is height limits and "how far you can go out limits" ? so we dont have these insane skybridges which would be completely overpowered and unfair

replies.body: Yes we are adapting maps so that they are appropriate for use during a tournament.
